findings.title: #1 Contract doesn’t import npm packages from source (like OpenZeppelin etc.)
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flatten the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities

findings.title: #2 A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is „“^0.8.9””.

findings.title: #3 Missing Zero Address Validation (missing-zero-check)
findings.description: Check that the address is not zero

findings.title: #4 N/A
findings.description: It is best practice to set the visibility of state variables explicitly

findings.title: #5 Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Emit an event for critical parameter changes

findings.title: #6 Unchecked tokens transfer
findings.description: Use `SafeERC20`, or ensure that the transfer/transferFrom return value is checked
